item.title: Farah add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Farah add a quote by Emha Ainun Nadjib
item.description: "Apa gunanya ilmu kalau tidak memperluas jiwa seseorang sehingga ia berlaku seperti samudera yang menampung sampah-sampah. Apa gunanya kepandaian kalau tidak memperbesar kepribadian seseorang sehingga ia makin sanggup memahami orang lain? " -- Emha Ainun Nadjib

item.title: Farah add a quote by Farah Hidayati
item.description: "Manusia tidak memilih tempat dia dilahirkan Tapi bisa memilih siapa yang dipercayai Pun rasa percaya bisa mengkhianatimu" -- Farah Hidayati

item.title: Farah add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Farah add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Farah add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Farah add a quote by Joe Abercrombie
item.description: "Once you've got a task to do, it's better to do it than live with the fear of it." -- Joe Abercrombie

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Maybe our favorite quotations say more about us than about the stories and people we're quoting." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description:
"I'm in love with you," he said quietly.
"Augustus," I said.
"I am," he said. He was staring at me, and I could see the corners of his eyes crinkling. "I'm in love with you, and I'm not in the business of denying myself the simple pleasure of saying true things. I'm in love with you, and I know that love is just a shout into the void, and that oblivion is inevitable, and that we're all doomed and that there will come a day when all our labor has been returned to dust, and I know the sun will swallow the only earth we'll ever have, and I am in love with you." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "That's always seemed so ridiculous to me, that people want to be around someone because they're pretty. It's like picking your breakfeast cereals based on color instead of taste." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "It is so hard to leaveâ€”until you leave. And then it is the easiest goddamned thing in the world." -- John Green

item.title: Farah add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Farah add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet." -- Jhumpa Lahiri
